title: Pony World 3 (2014) PC
description:
============================================
Pony World 3 (2014) PC
============================================

Languages: Eng

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Third installment to the very successful Pony World
series with improved gameplay, cartoony 3D graphics
and whole new, bigger and better Pony Town to
explore, live in and form relationships. Socialize
with other ponies, play with them and meet your
beloved one. In Pony World 3 yo u can create your
own dream pony from scratch and help develop his
character by choosing way of education, career and
make a lot of friends. Change your pony's looks and
clothing, add glasses and saddles or even tattoos
Make your pony's farm his dream place to live
Build it and expand to look best in the
neighborhood. Decorate it and plant new plants to
acquire higher status. Sell products from your farm
to earn money for food, gifts and toys. Improved
building mode with lots of new buildings and
decorations will make your farm unique. Pony Town
has all facilities needed by your pony to spend
playful time, develop its career and education and
care for its looks and health. Visit stylists and
beauty salons to become the most pretty and stylish
pony. Attend school and university to find better
paid job. And there's a lot of places you can go
after (or instead of) work: theatre, disco, skate
park, circus and more. And if that's not enough you
can always go to the beach or take a trip around
the forest or in the mountains

============================================
Instruction:                               =
============================================

* Install the game
* Play from Desktop
